A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have enjoyed watching Star Wars since I was young but watching this movie was more painful than enjoyable. I was finding myself wondering when it would be over. Way too much poor comedy for a Star Wars movie and some very odd scenes. This whole movie was very upsetting to me. I don’t recommend this movie at all for any Star Wars fan it will only upset you. Hopefully Disney will get its act together for the next movie.
